programme.title: What Could Be Bad: Episode 106 - Harder to Breathe with Ryan Dusick
Apex Fusion: Bridging the Blockchain Divide
programme.desc: Imagine a world where blockchains don’t speak different languages. Where Ethereum and Bitcoin don’t just coexist but they collaborate. In this episode we sit down with the visionary founders behind Apex Fusion, a bold layer1 project on a mission to unify the fractured blockchain universe. With a tri-chain architecture and a bridge that actually works, they are not just building tech - they are potentially laying down the infrastructure for the next evolution of web3.

programme.title: INSANE ETHEREUM PUMP PREPARE FOR CPI PIVOT
programme.desc: ETH is pumping ahead of the July CPI data report due August 13th, are you trading the volatility? Or are you sitting on your hands? We'll be getting into this and much more on today's show, smash the like if you watched until the end!!

programme.title: DeFi, DAOs & the Next Wave of Web3 Innovation | Live at EthCC Cannes
programme.desc: Live from EthCC Cannes, this sponsored Edge of Show by Ammalgam brings together three trailblazers building the infrastructure for Web3’s next leap forward. First, Marc Boiron, CEO of Polygon Labs, shares how Polygon is tackling scalability, interoperability, and the drive toward a unified Web3 ecosystem. Next, Rebecca Liao From, Head of Ecosystem at Saga, reveals how Saga’s chainlets are unlocking customizable, high-performance blockchain environments for developers worldwide. Finally, Jordan Jefferson, Founder of DogeOS, takes us inside the playful yet powerful vision for a meme-driven operating system that merges community culture with serious blockchain innovation. From cross-chain solutions to developer empowerment and the rise of niche blockchain platforms, this conversation offers a clear view of how the next internet is being built—right now. Don't forget to like, subscribe, and hit the notification bell for more insights from the cutting edge of technology!

programme.title: Formation of Sword of Xingguo
programme.desc: The Independent Regiment and the Red Ninth Regiment fighting on the front line suffered heavy losses. The two teams led by Xiao Qiang and Chen Xiong thus merged. Liu Zao also joined this troop, at which time Sword of Xingguo began to take shape. Hearing that the party organization in the White District sent people to cross the line of fire for top-secret strategic intelligence, Central Revolutionary Military Commission ordered the Sword of Xingguo to rush to meet the intelligence officer and protect him at all costs to report the situation to the headquarters of the Ruijin Red Army. This became the first task for the Sword of Xingguo. Receiving intelligence about important military deployment of the enemys Lushan Conference, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission was determined to accelerate the strategic shift. The Red Army assembled in Yudu to prepare for the Long March. In order to allow more than 80,000 Red Army troops to cross the Yongdu River without alerting the enemies, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission decided to cross the river at night. The Sword of Xingguo was divided into two squads by order from superiors: Chen Xiong led a team to cut off communication facilities along the Yongdu River and eliminate possible enemy scouts in time; Xiao Qiang led the remaining soldiers to explore the depth of the river several times, ruling out the possibility of wading across the river and quickly building a pontoon bridge to help the main force of the Red Army cross the river. At the same time, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission and the Guangdong Army reached a secret agreement that the Cantonese Army promised to make way for the Red Army after crossing the Yudu River. The Red Army thus crossed the Yudu River and embarked on an arduous journey.

programme.title: Encouraging Fuel Conservation

Throughout their journey, they remain committed to their shared vision of developing sustainable fuel for a better future.

programme.title: Trouble Comes to Q-Town

Flame, the new captain of the Q-Star League, steps up to stop them. The outcome of this encounter between the Buster Gang and Flame awaits with bated breath.

programme.title: Power of Flame
programme.desc: Flames unlocking of new equipment resulted in chaos in Q-Town, causing significant damage. However, a heroic figure emerged at the last moment to address the crisis and protect the town. With explosive power in tow, this fiery hero aims to save the day. Will they succeed in their mission?

programme.title: DISCIPLINE
programme.desc: A series of murders are confounding the local police with its residue of mutilated corpses. It begins when a sadistic cult murders willing victims for entertainment. Professor Lafitte, a rich sophisticated man, whose hobby is collecting souls, leads the cult. One of his students is Jack, brilliant and obsessed with composing avant-grade music. He decides to compose a concerto for synthesizer & samplers that is based on the recorded sound of human screams. Jack is drawn into the clutches of the professor, who is guiding him into a dark path of self discovery, in his attempt to create a new kind of music. In his quest for this new kind of music, he begins to seek out human pain. The professor leads Jack into his much more dangerous private activities. Jacks girlfriend Claudia and his best friend Benny are journalists for the collage newspaper and are covering a series of bizarre murders and mutilations that has the police stumped. Benny finally discovers that there is a connection between the murders, the professor and Jack, just as Jack and Professor Lafiette and his diabolical servants are threatening Claudias lives. The final scene threatens not only Jacks creativity, but also his very life.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 30
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

Will the Creepy Candy do the right thing and prove that true beauty comes from the heart? Check out this episode of Fleeting Beauty!

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Glass Tower
programme.desc: Buzz tells the others of a candy trapped deep in the basement of the library.he Creepy Candy embark on a dangerous journey and discover Bubbles, a pack of gum, stuck in a glass tower.Can they survive the perils awaiting them and find a way to save Bubbles? Tune in to find out!

programme.title: TRING TRING
programme.desc: The days are getting busier at the hotel and the constant running around and hauling plates etc is getting to Sundar. He just wishes he could quickly finish up and snooze the rest of the time. After an especially hectic day of waiting/cleaning, Sundar cant believe his luck when he finds an old busted cycle near the backyard of the Hotel. With a little tinkering (taking parts out), Sundar manages to change it into a unicycle that will help him clean up and wait tables faster. What Sundar doesnt expect is that balancing on a unicycle can be quite a tricky issue he botches up the deliveries badly and Chai Raja orders him to get rid of the unicycle. Sundar does so with a heavy heart but imagine his surprise when the next day morning he wakes up to a familiar bell- its the unicycleits back and Basha is on it. What hurts more is that Chai Raja is encouraging it as Basha on the unicycle is helping amp up the customer flow. Sundar wants his unicycle back not only because he believes it should him getting the applause but also because the nifty Basha is using the unicycle performance as a faade to stealing fritters. Sundar and Basha have a showdown and Sundar getting carried away, performs with such a frenzy that ultimately he crashes the pantry down. The final shot is off Sundar cleaning up the mess wearing the cycle tire as a reluctant garland.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Tarot Tales
programme.desc: A fake yogi loses his forecasting parrot and is in search for a replacement. As he passes by GrandPA’s house he sees Keet and wants him as his fortune telling parrot.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Christmas Ring Ring
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: NO BANANAS!!
programme.desc: Chai Raja in all gusto, pulls open his pantry and finds that he is out of bananas- now how will he make fries?! Oops! Quickly putting Sundar in charge, Chai Raja hops on his rusty cycle and heads off for fresh stock. Meanwhile, Sundar sees the customers line up and for the sake of Chai Raja wants to somehow keep them happy. Sundar sees Basha snacking on his private banana reserve and sprinting over strikes a deal with Basha- give me your bananas for now, and I will let you snack. Basha, after a moments thought agrees and the deal is struck. As Basha in an odd moment of generosity, entertains the customers, Sundar frantically hashes up fritters- but when Basha shows up for his share, Sundarsidelines him and serves the customers. When this happens more than twice, Basha loses his nice-guy face and decides to set things straight. The customers find their plates vanishing and their teas arriving in curious ways. Sundar tries to iron things out, but Basha is in a frenzy. Soon when Chai Raja arrives triumphantly hoisting fresh bananas, he is literally stampeded by the fleeing customers. Sundar stands sheepish as not far away Basha chuckles holding a pile of banana fritters. He bites into one and chews...but then in disgust spits it out; after all Sundar cant cook like Chai Raja. Shrugging, Basha digs out his special reserve banana and chews on it philosophically.

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: MALAI KAM CHAI
programme.desc: Shantappa, a coconut seller has put his stall right next to hotel California. Sundar attracts customers by showing his antics. However, things change when Basha meddles in and joins the rival party. Soon the healthy competition turns into unending events of nuisance where the customers from both the stalls have to bear the brunt.

programme.title: START CAMERA ACTION
programme.desc: A movie shooting crew comes to the premises of Hotel California and decides that as their shooting location. Chai Raja is excited about the unexpected business opportunity. To Sundars delight, it is his dream girl the Poodle who is doing a role in the movie. To Chai Rajas annoyance Sundar is all about wooing and impressing the girl poodle. Naughty Basha has two plans stealing his favourite snacks and disrupting Sundars love moves. The movie set literally falls down to pieces!!!

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Count it out
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: Check Out Yuk
programme.desc: When Yuk accidentally gets stuck in a book and the book gets checked out of the library, he comes face to face with the dangers of being out in the real world.Will he survive all the twists and turns his journey takes him on? Will he ever make it back to the library in one piece? Will Icky and Yicky have to continue on as a duo? Watch the crazy shenanigans in the episode Yuk Checks Out!

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Hula Hoop
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: BASHA vs BILLA
programme.desc: Basha is in great spirits as he once again runs circles around Sundar and gets his daily exercise leading the other in a one-sided chase when suddenly his naughtiness takes a nosedive as he finds himself face to face with his biggest rival Billa a monkey who is naughtier, meaner and more menacing. The moment Sundar finds out that Billa also has a fascination for banana fritters, he bribes the new monkey to his side. Now for the first time, Basha has to face a foe who is his match, or perhaps a tough match. Lets see how this all ends!

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Dude's Lagoon
programme.desc: When a mermaid seeks his help because a sea monster is destroying her home, Dude has to figure out a way to stop the creature, especially when he learns its Sneevil and Biggs latest contraption.

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: What Goes Up…
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting a party for all of Abra-Dabra and is granting Deedee the honour of inviting everyone to assemble at 12 o’clock sharp. But with Tiggy having prepared all the delectable dishes and only one hour to get them to the venue and Deedee rushing to invite everybody; Deedee decides to use some magic for the timebeing. On sprinkling some of her ‘light as air’ magic powder on the plates and Nino stringing them together as the master knots-man he is, Tiggy is able to walk them over to town-hall like a bunch of balloons. Deedee and Nino get to invite Charlie and the twins just when Boris misfires his new fishing dart gun onto Uncle Charlie causing him to fall out of his hammock. The Doobydoos and Mewmew are playing together by trying to find which group can make the tallest team-tower, just when Deedee and Nino invites them for the party. Back at town-hall Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy create a floating food game, but Tiggy reminds the Mayor that he isn’t good at tying knots. When the guests arrive, Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy usher them in and tell them how to play the game, but discover that all the strings have loosened themselves and are floating high up near the ceiling. Deedee improvises and gets the twins to use their toy dart guns to pull the food-laden plates to themselves. The Doobydoos along with Mewmew make really tall team-towers and pull their jelly plates to themselves with glee. Nino pulls down a plate that happens to be a bowl of custard. Nino gets drenched in custard, but in a very delicious way.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: The Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: Old couple without a child bakes a gingerbread kid GoGo. GoGo escapes the oven, and runs away from the animals who try to eat him.

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: A sticky situation
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a sticky wrapper and the twins arrive in a sandy desert. They travel to the pond world and to the winter world before they can put it in a bin.

programme.title: Mewmew’s Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: A4 Paper
programme.desc: Blank paper? No problem, Hepi and Briko are full of ideas

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: The Toy Room – Steadfast Ti Soldier
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the “Steadfast Tin Soldier”, having been called out by the soldier’s toy companions. SANDRA, who has always dreamt of changing this story’s tragic ending, hopes she will be able to prevent the Soldier and the Ballerina from being thrown into the fire. But, once they arrive in the toys’ room, it does not take SANDRA long to realise that her mission is going to be very difficult indeed. The evil JACK-IN-THE-BOX has taken the SOLDIER prisoner and threatens to melt him down into a useless lump of tin if the BALLERINA does not agree to marry him.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Easter Egg Surprise Smash
programme.desc: Its the Easter Eggstravanganza and Sneevil traps Smighties in googs - slime-filled gooey eggs. Luckily, Dude is able to crack the secret code and help the Super Six rescue them in time.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Top Turtle
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Stitch in Time
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: Mister Perfect
programme.desc: Nora is so impressed with Eddie’s philanthropic music concert, Fred uses Friday to trick Eddie into letting him headline the show.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Duda Buddy
programme.desc: Duda thinks the Scottie Buddy is pretty awesome and asks Scot if he could go for a ride. Scot flatly refuses, so Duda is determined to make a Scottie Buddy of his own. Realizing that it is difficult to make one, Duda returns to Scot hoping for some help. Scot agrees to help Duda if he becomes his assistant. But Duda ends up causing more chaos instead of being helpful. Scot sends him off with a box of old parts and tells him to make his own Duda Buddy. Surprisingly, Duda manages to build a decent replica. Meanwhile, Scot discovers that his new wheel is not suitable for Scottie Buddy and wants him to return his old wheel to Duda...

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon - Saitn George’s Legend
programme.desc: SANDRA visits her UNCLE TONY at the old funfair where he works and is shocked to hear that it is about to shut down, because of falling visitor numbers. When she is on the ghost train, she is visited by her assistant FO, who has come to get her for a new case in the “Land of Fairytales”. On this occasion, SANDRA and FO travel into the legend of “Saint George and the Dragon”, where they face a very singular DRAGON.

programme.title: It's OK To Make Mistakes
programme.desc: Dada and Bubbles make a delicious dish together. Soon, Duda shows up and wants to decorate it with ketchup, but ends up pouring it all over Bubble. Meanwhile, Caber is busy organizing his books at home. Duda comes and offers to help, but only causes more mess. Later, Duda sees an apple and tries to pick it for Bubble; Unfortunately, he loses his balance and falls into a paint that splatters all over Pinkar. Poor Duda is having a very bad day. With the help of Scots Time Machine, Duda decides to travel back in time and fix his "mistakes." Will Duda be able to undo his mistakes? Or will he discover something quite surprising?

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Balloonastics
programme.desc: When Pancake becomes bored with a household chore, he gives up in frustration. Later in the Zooniverse, he’s delighted to help the fallen North Star return to the night sky, but first he has to learn to value the smaller task he has been given, and how it can add to the whole. Be open minded and optimistic, and you’ll be able to take pride in any job!

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Boom Boom-1936
programme.desc: World War I, apparently. There is a series of quick blackout gags, including a soldier that throws the pin, is blown sky-high by the grenade, and is caught in a net by an ambulance driver; one soldier's encounters with very smart bullets; a machine gunner with the jitters. Porky leads a charge, but with no support from his company, he runs back and dives under Beans' bunk. After a quick chorus of "You're in the Army Now," a messenger pigeon drops in with news that General Hardtack is being held prisoner. They dash off in a motorcycle/sidecar, chased by another smart bullet, and arrive in the nick of time to dispatch the general's captors. They fly off in a plane and get shot down to end up together in the hospital.

programme.title: Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: Page Miss Glory 1936
programme.desc: A bellhop in the No 1. hotel of a smalltown awaiting the arrival of Miss Glory dreams he has to page Miss Glory at a first class hotel in New York, and this turns out to be a nightmare. Finally he is awakened by the manager, because Miss Glory's car has arrived, but instead of a beautiful lady, a child star a la Shirley Temple steps out ...

programme.title: Lights Fantastic 1942
programme.desc: A tour of the bright lights of New York City, where the various advertising signs come to life.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: Much ado About Nutting 1953
programme.desc: A squirrel in a downtown park lugs a giant coconut back home, but nothing he does can seem to crack it open.

programme.title: Neath Brooklyn Bridge-1942
programme.desc: The East Side Kids uncover the body of a murder victim, but must protect the innocent girl accused of the crime

programme.title: The Rounders-1914
programme.desc: Two drunks live in the same hotel. One beats his wife, the other is beaten by his. They go off and get drunk together. They try to sleep in a restaurant using tables as beds and are thrown out. They lie down in a rowboat which fills with water, drowning them--a fate apparently better than going home to their wives.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962 ;season 2; The Night the Roof Fell In
programme.desc: Having each had a rough day, Laura and Rob argue, but only their goldfish can report the truth as Laura and Rob later tell colorful, self-aggrandizing versions to others of what happened.

programme.title: Balloonatic 1923
programme.desc: A hapless amusement park attendant finds his run away balloon ride has left him in a strange predicament

programme.title: The Face on the Barroom Floor - 1914
programme.desc: The plot is a satire derived from Hugh Antoine D'Arcy's poem of the same title. The painter courts Madeleine but loses to the wealthy client who sits for his portrait. The despairing artist draws the girl's portrait on the barroom floor and gets tossed out. Years later he sees her, her husband and their horde of children. Unrecognized by her, Charlie shakes off his troubles and walks off into the future.

programme.title: Pool Sharks-1915
programme.desc: Two romantic rivals play a game of pool for the hand of their lady love.

programme.title: The Gorilla 1939
programme.desc: When a wealthy man is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Program; Season 3;Episode 3; Jack Gets Robbed
programme.desc: Jack is pestered by a young autograph seeker, then Bob Crosby sings a medley of songs from "Peter Pan" to the child. After the show, Jack has trouble getting to sleep because of a leaky faucet and forces Rochester to rock his bed. Finally asleep, a pair of burglars try to ransack Jack's bedroom but are defeated by his booby traps.

High Lonesome 1950
programme.desc: When a sudden spurt of murders occurs in Texas Big Bend country, suspicion immediately falls on a young drifter who just moved to the area.

programme.title: Old west tv social media promo..
Lightning Bill 1938
programme.desc: Lightning Carson's nephew has been falsely accused of murder. To get in with the gang, Lightning poses as a Mexican. He also appears as himself making his costume changes at his sister's ranch. Just as he about to bring in the gang, a henchman finds evidence of his masquerade and arrives to expose the hoax.

programme.title: Law of the West 1932
programme.desc: For revenge the outlaw Morgan steals the Carruthers young son. Seventeen years later Carruthers arrives in the valley where Morgan, his gang, and the now grown Bob hide. After Morgan shoots Tracy, he tells Bob that Carruthers did it and sends Bob out after him. But unknown to Bob, Morgan has put blanks in his gun.

programme.title: Lucky Terror 1936
programme.desc: A sharpshooter in a traveling sideshow is falsely accused of murdering a local miner.

programme.title: Loser's End-1934
programme.desc: Jack rides into trouble when he meets up with Bill Meeker and his outlaw gang. Rescued from the gang's clutches by Don carlos, he joins forces with Carlos and with the help of Lolita who learns of the gang's next raid, they go after the culprits.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean sits down with Lynn Hawkins of Placencia Cigars, one of the most respected names in the industry. Lynn pulls back the curtain on Placencia's extensive history as a leading grower and producer, sharing insights into their meticulous tobacco cultivation, the intricate art of their cigar manufacturing process, and what makes their family's legacy truly stand out in the world of premium cigars.

programme.title: Privada Masterclass
programme.desc: Join us for a masterclass that goes beyond the basics of cigars, exploring every step of how they’re crafted and what makes each one unique. We’ll dig into the science of the soil and water that shape the tobacco, from the field to the final product.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode of Texas Cigar Roadshow, we’re smoking a Panamanian Puro from Don Giovanni. Inspired by the Cuban Puro tradition, this cigar uses only the finest locally grown tobacco, with no additives or blends from other countries—pure and unaltered, just like the Cubans.

programme.title: Cigar Titans
programme.desc: Is time an issue? Well, we have a solution to your time dilemma, cigarillos. Join us this week as we dive into these small but tasty treats!

programme.title: Cigar Titans
programme.desc: This week on we’re back with another unboxing of the Luxury Cigar Club! Join us as we reveal the latest premium cigars inside the box, share our first impressions, and discuss what makes this collection stand out from the rest.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co
programme.desc: This episode features Matt and Dana from DVD Brewing, who discuss their journey from homebrewing to opening a taproom and brewery, highlighting their collaboration with Creekside Cigar Co. on unique beers like an oatmeal stout, and exploring the art of pairing cigars with various beer styles.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co
programme.desc: This episode features Mike Lawich, who shares his passion for rare and boutique cigars, including unique Cuban farm rolls and factory rolls, while discussing the future of cigar lounges and advocating for a focus on hospitality and community.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiasts Mark and Alex to review the My Father Fonseca cigar. Together, they examine its smooth, balanced flavors, flawless construction, and overall performance, sharing their insights on why this cigar is a favorite among connoisseurs.

programme.title: Guest Jeezy
programme.desc: Jeezy is a legendary rapper with a new memoir out now called Adversity For Sale. Here we talk about his hard times growing up, his criminal years, and how he’s now into therapy and meditation.

programme.title: Guests Lydia Caesar, Iyana Mone't, Bonita Jalane
programme.desc: Description Contestants answer trivia questions about Capricorn and Aquarius celebrities, trending news, music & entertainment, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Guest Mic King
programme.desc: Artist and tech entrepreneur Mic King shares his musical journey, his recent project with Musiq Soulchild, as well as the intersection between music, technology and social media. He also dishes on his experience working with brands like the Wall Street Journal, Complex, and JP Morgan and how independent artists can use social media and technology to their advantage.

programme.title: June 4, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for June 4, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guests Dymon, John Alex Gatsby, and Carlos Scott
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Dymon, John Alex Gatsby, and Carlos Scott who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Life in a Sanctuary
programme.desc: This unique film explores living in a sanctuary, from the animals' point of view.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - "Meaty" Tower & Tofu Scramble
programme.desc: Restaurant owner Sarkis Vartanian joins Bodybuilders Korin Sutton and Ryan Nelson!

programme.title: The Secret Reason We Eat Meat
programme.desc: Wouldn't you like to know?

programme.title: Trying Vegan With Mario - Cashew Ginger Wasabi Stir Fry and Zucchini Fritters
programme.desc: Chef Mario's on a roll, revealing the succulent secret to ginger wasabi cashew butter. Say whaaat?

programme.title: Kale Krew - Tastes of Bri
programme.desc: Tastes of Bri, just outside of Chicago, offers plant-based dishes by a Le Cordon Bleu trained chef.

programme.title: Jan Is a Protective Mama! That's All!
programme.desc: They thought Jan was a mean cow. But, she was just protecting her son. Now, they're both free!

programme.title: Kale Krew's NYC's Spicy Moon
programme.desc: Spicy Moon is the hottest spot in NYC's hippest hood: The Bowery. Come join the party &eat with us

programme.title: Trying Vegan With Mario - Chef Mario Reveals Cooking Secrets
programme.desc: Chef Mario Fabbri launched one of the world's first vegan cooking shows on TV. Now, he reveals all!

programme.title: Countdown to Year Zero
programme.desc: Only a few years are left before the point of no return, so what can you do about it? Watch now!

programme.title: Ghost Boat
programme.desc: Trapped aboard the family yacht, Samantha lives out her personal Hell, night after night, answering to the cruel and painful demands of the ship's alarm system. Taking a journey into the depths of depravity, she wakes each morning to the disfiguring scars left by the previous night's horror and searches for the answer to a missing memory: 'Could I have killed my family... Or did Hell get it wrong?

programme.title: H.P. Lovecraft's Monster Portal
programme.desc: A cult is about to waken H.P. Lovecraft's most feared creature...

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: Rose awakes in an unknown house following a serious car accident with memory loss and no ability to walk. Her Mother and boyfriend are there to help her. Rose wants to piece together her life before the accident. All is not what it seems...

programme.title: La Maldición de la Sirena
programme.desc: Un joven se enamora de una joven seductora y sensual que conoce en la playa. Cuanto más se enamora de ella, más aprende los peligros de enamorarse de una sirena...

programme.title: Aldea del Vampiro
programme.desc: Rebecca busca a su hermana, una joven periodista desaparecida mientras investigaba una serie de desafortunados sucesos. El rastro la conduce a Timere, un lugar remoto alejado del ajetreo de la vida cotidiana, donde entre el hermético silencio de los habitantes del pueblo crece el temor a que actúen fuerzas oscuras y nadie se atreve a salir de casa por la noche. Aquí Rebecca conoce a un extravagante escritor, al guardián de la iglesia del pueblo y, sobre todo, a Caleb, un hombre encantador, rico y elegante cuya oscura mirada esconde un escalofriante secreto. Es en este pueblo, donde el tiempo parece moverse entre las sombras y el peligro acecha en cada esquina, donde Rebecca se entera de la terrible verdad y comienza la batalla entre el bien y el mal...

programme.title: Día del Abandono
programme.desc: Jenny Bilson, una estudiante de último curso de instituto, es la estudiante perfecta, la maravillosa hija de un veterano detective de policía y todo un sueño americano. Pero el único error que no es consciente de haber cometido está a punto de perseguirla de una forma muy violenta, cuando su pasado regresa en busca de venganza...

programme.title: El Pistolero
programme.desc: Uno de los hombres más poderosos de México llega a un pueblo en busca de nuevos pistoleros que quieran formal parte de su equipo, y recluta a un hombre sencillo que acepta el trabajo porque quiere vengar la muerte de su padre.

programme.title: Brindis Mortal
programme.desc: te presentamos la historia de Ramon, el hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante quien anhela convertirse en la mano derecha de su padre y formar parte de su grupo de sicarios. Pero su padre aun no lo considera listo para el trabajo y le da largas. lo cual desespera a Ramon y lo lleva a tomar decisiones que cambiaran para siempre la relación entre padre e hijo.

programme.title: Amor Interés y Muerte
programme.desc: La ambición es la causa por la que unos padres obligan a su hija menor a casarse con un hombre de 50 años para asegurar un futuro lleno de comodidades, sin embargo no contaban con que las cosas no saldrían como lo tenían planeado.

programme.title: Aute Retrato
programme.desc: Recopilación de los mejores momentos de Luis Eduardo Aute en sus 50 años de carrera musical y artística. Un recorrido por sus distintas facetas creativas y sus bandas sonoras. Toda la vida el artista desvelada por un grupo de testigos, colaboradores y amigos que, a través de sus testimonios, demuestran el impacto que han tenido sus icónicas canciones sobre la actualidad musical.

programme.title: El Cóndor En Nueva York
programme.desc: Un narcotraficante de Nueva York, llamado Damián, ha creado una nueva droga con efectos impactantes. Después de varias muertes accidentales, la DEA y la policía se embarcan en una búsqueda inútil en busca de este jefe de la mafia. Damián comienza a derrotar a su competencia con la ayuda de su científico privado y un informante de la DEA. El hijo del alcalde Martínez (de Súper Cóndor) queda en coma tras consumir el nuevo medicamento. El alcalde Martínez vuela a Nueva York desde Perú para comenzar su propia investigación en busca de Damián y una cura. Todo parece sombrío para los agentes de la DEA, el alcalde Martínez y su hijo; hasta que llegue la ayuda. El Cóndor llega a Nueva York desde Perú para ayudar a revertir los efectos de esta nueva y brutal droga y llevar a Damián ante la justicia.

programme.title: 4 Metros
programme.desc: 4 METROS relata, en tono de comedia romántica, la historia de un hombre entrando en la crisis de los 40. Joaquín tiene un zumbido en los oídos y poco sabe de sí mismo. Se ha dejado llevar sin intervenir demasiado en sus deseos. No escucha su voz interior. Su vida afectiva y laboral no tienen rumbo. El zumbido quizá sea la expresión, no asumida ni entendida todavía, de un ruido metafórico de la vida gritándole por dónde ir. Su novia tiene 20 años menos, aparece la presión social y familiar sobre la paternidad, sentirse útil, la vocación, el trabajo y cómo ser feliz. Hasta que otra mujer irrumpe y todo parece acomodarse. Pero siempre el orden debe ser interno. Así, como si el destino tomara la palabra, su vida cambiará 4 metros abajo del agua, donde aparece un sendero para encontrar la identidad.

programme.title: Los Vigilantes del Ródano
programme.desc: Octavio, un misterioso hombre que se dedica a acoger a personas con pasados di3ciles recibe a Carmela, una periodista de espectáculos sin escrúpulos; Román, un arrogante músico de rock y Diego, un cínico escritor autor de la exitosa trilogía “Johnny King”. Todos ellos se encontrarán atrapados en un enigmá6co estudio de grabación. Por más que lo intentan, no logran salir de este lugar. Se ven obligados a tratar con los músicos invitados para grabar allí y las situaciones confusas que con ellos se generan. Todo esto mientras intentan averiguar cómo conseguir escapar del estudio y encontrar la razón por la cual se encuentran recluídos

programme.title: La Leyenda De La Deseada
programme.desc: Recién llegada a Villaldama, Lizzy, apodada "La Deseada" por su belleza, se enamora de Fernando, un joven humilde. Sus padres la encierran para evitar la relación, mientras Lizzy cae misteriosamente enferma. Elsa, su madre, recurre al Padre Reyes, un sacerdote que deberá enfrentar los oscuros hechizos de Teresa, una mujer obsesionada con Fernando.

programme.title: Gritos del Monday
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de Ingeniería Ambiental realizan un trabajo en la Reserva Ecológica de los Saltos del Monday, conocido por su rica fauna y su rica historia. Para el trabajo, los alumnos deciden acampar en el lugar, en medio de la obscura noche son sorprendidos por un hecho que desencadenará a lo largo de sus días posteriores, en especial a una de las estudiantes.

programme.title: Los Siete Sellos de la Santa Muerte 2
programme.desc: Después de desmantelar a una poderosa secta los misteriosos crímenes continúan y la policía se dedica a investigar quien es el nuevo líder de la organización para atraparlo y acabar con la violencia.

programme.title: God Will Work It In!
programme.desc: Sometimes, even when your situation isn’t getting better, you are. Stop stressing like you need to do it alone and remember that God is with you in it. He’s already given you what you need — and He’ll help you work it in to what you’re facing.

programme.title: God’s Got The Hard Part!
programme.desc: Just like a seed, you’re not buried, you’re planted. When you feel like you’re facing trials in the dark, remember God’s developing you to help you fulfill your purpose.

programme.title: God Gave It To Me
programme.desc: God has given you everything you need for the battle you’re facing. When you refocus on Him rather than what He’s given you, He sustains you through weariness to bring you to victory.

programme.title: God Wants To Show You
programme.desc: God wants to show you what’s next, but He’s waiting on you. If you want to see God’s point of view, start by slowing down and going His speed. Breakthrough happens when you let go and allow God to show you the way.

programme.title: Enough Until It Comes
programme.desc: In “Enough Until It Comes,” we learn that even when we face unanswered prayers, God has still given us enough for what’s next.
